Reviews.Title: Good cables
Reviews.Author: David M.
Reviews.Content: Well assembled. The connector boot protects the wires well. The ends are pre-stripped and tinned so I was able to connect them to the power supply unit right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: KdKazaam
Reviews.Content: Very fast installation. no confusion, just results.They made my job easy.Need more of these. Great coloring. made it easy.

Reviews.Title: Works with my cameras perfectly
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I had some cameras around the house where the DC port was cut off. So I bought a pair of these to hook up to my power supply. The cables worked perfectly and I now have a full surveilance system at home. Highly recommend these if you need to repair a sliced cable for your security camera.

Reviews.Title: Reasonably priced and good qualiy
Reviews.Author: WFC
Reviews.Content: Not much to say here. Product was exactly as described: reasonably priced and good quality. Worked just fine for intended purpose.

Reviews.Title: Wire gauge is not 18awg...more like 22-24awg.
Reviews.Author: x_Warrior
Reviews.Content: The description says 18awg, but the pigtails are more like 22-24awg.  Not good for 12v 1 amp required by some CCTV cameras and the DVR unit..

Reviews.Title: Low Voltage lighting
Reviews.Author: Tracy Lenz
Reviews.Content: Many low voltage swithces and connections use this type of connectorsgreat for adding low voltage solar lighting.Makes the jog go together quickly

Reviews.Title: Nice parts
Reviews.Author: RICH MILLER
Reviews.Content: These connectors help our job get done in a quick and neat manner!We had to run 100's of feet of CAT5 cable and these were the ends we used at the camera.

Reviews.Title: good wire.
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: I use it for power notwork devices from one ATX PSU.pros:Not thin wires.Quality connector.cons:not found.

Reviews.Title: Used it to hook up my rear view camera
Reviews.Author: H. Rosser "hrosser"
Reviews.Content: The rear view camera needs to hook up to power - 12vdc - and to the video.This is the part need to connect power - along with the female.

ProductInfo.Features:
Center positive 2.1mm DC plug
Molded male connectors
Outside diameter: 5.5mm
Inside diameter: 2.1mm
1 foot length, Easy to maneuver and install, and also helps to conserve space
ProductInfo.Name: CCTV Security Camera DC Male Power Plug Pigtail Cable (10 Pack)
